trans-unit.source: Your group membership has been extended.
The link has expired and is no longer valid. It can only be used for a few days after receiving it.
trans-unit.target: De link is verlopen en niet geldig meer. Na ontvangst is de link maar enkele dagen geldig.

trans-unit.source: This account was already extended not too long ago. The link can not be used again.
trans-unit.target: Dit account is recentelijk al verlengd. De link kan niet nogmaals worden gebruikt.

trans-unit.source: Your group membership ###GROUPID### has been extended until ###ENDTIME###.
trans-unit.target: Uw groepslidmaatschap voor groep ###GROUPID### is verlengd tot ###ENDTIME###.
Gebruiker heeft nu verlopende toegang ###GROUPID### tot ###ENDTIME###.

trans-unit.source: Your account has been extended until ###ENDTIME###.
User has been extended by email until ###ENDTIME###.
trans-unit.target: Gebruiker is verlengd via e-mail tot ###ENDTIME###.
